text: Charming and calming theme from the black sheep of the DK series. I wonder if Nintendo would ever dare green light a new 3D Donkey Kong game. Retro made two amazing titles in DKCR and Tropical Freeze... I wonder what they could do with the franchise in 3D with a Metroid Prime-like open world. Yeah... that's never happening.
author: SupraDarky

text: It was great that the composer brought this back for the Mario and Rabbids DLC. I wonder if it was his idea?
author: Hawlo

text: Fun fact: This was based heavily on an unused track from Banjo-Kazooie.

text: It’s easy to forget that DK64 was universally loved when it came out, and won numerous Game of the Year honors. Some games just don’t age well.
author: David E.

text: I think it did age well, but the memes of "oh my gosh so many things to collect" created an outlook for newcomers to dismiss it as a chore when it never felt that way playing and beating it.
